math/

combigen.pro


top source combigen

Math

result = combigen(n, k)

Generates all possible combinations n-choose-k.

Return value

Returns a M x K array of all K-length combinations of numbers from 0 to N-1.

Parameters

n in

Maximum number.

k in

Number of elements in each combination.

Examples

Generate all combinations 5-choose-3: IDL> print, combigen(5,3) 0 0 0 0 0 0 1 1 1 2 1 1 1 2 2 3 2 2 3 3 2 3 4 3 4 4 3 4 4 4

Author information
